attributes.action: Regulate the combination of chemicals found in New Psychoactive Substances
attributes.additional_details:
Regulate the Combination of chemicals found in New Psychoactive Substances and introduce an education programme that targets p7 - s4 on the dangers of New Psychoactive Substances.

Although new psychoactive substances haven’t been directly linked to deaths it has been linked to hundred of hospital admissions. It is a problem which needs to be solved before it leads to deaths

We need to ensure that future generations are protected from this issue and that the issue does not escalate to deaths.
